meanings.definition: A long, thin piece of bread typically flavored with garlic or herbs.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious breadstick with my pasta.
meanings.sent2: She dipped the breadstick in marinara sauce.
meanings.sent3: The breadstick told a cheesy joke to the garlic bread.
meanings.sent4: The breadstick stood tall among the other breads, like a flavorful flag.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the warm breadstick filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A breadstick can be used as a utensil for dipping in sauces or soups.
meanings.sent1: He used the breadstick to scoop up the last bit of soup.
meanings.sent2: The kids loved using breadsticks to eat their spaghetti.
meanings.sent3: The breadstick tried to breakdance in the marinara sauce.
meanings.sent4: The breadstick was a loyal companion to the bowl of soup, never failing to assist.
meanings.sent5: The breadstick's tip soaked up the flavorful broth, enhancing every bite.
